ComicInfo.Title: Drink, Fucker!; Mosquito; Who Cares About Love?; Equinox, Jr.; You Don't Change a Person's Mind, He Just Stops Arguing; Father's Day; Kidney Stoned; Are the Kids All Right?; The Fights; The Love Swine; Roy; Kidney Stoned Again
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bar philosophy from two friends drinking together.
A murder in the village- a folk tale about how the mosquito was born.
Assorted misunderstandings- Venus thinks she's in love with Carlos the comic book store clerk, but Petra is having a fling with him. Venus leaves the store crestfallen once she catches Carlos and Kat in an embrace. Petra trashes the store in a rage once Carlos tells her they can't see each other anymore.
Fake old-fashioned gag strip.
A father goes in search of his absent teenage daughter.
Wilson is present at a birth.
Two intellectuals in superhero costumes bemoaning contemporary culture.
Events in the life of John Lester Johnson- a six panel sequence focusing on the Jack Dempsey/John Lester Johnson fight from 1916 and its effects on Dempsey's career.
An attempted child kidnapping at a playground.
Roy keeps his spirit and does good.
Venus recounts to Fritz what she thinks she told her about her model boyfriend and how they met.
